parameters.name: hospitalName
parameters.description: Hospital Name. Eg, HospitalA or HospitalB

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The logical resource id associated with the resource.

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The identifier of a patient to list statements for.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the medication statement.

parameters.name: startEffectiveDate
parameters.description: Start date from the date-range of the Medication was ordered.

parameters.name: endEffectiveDate
parameters.description: End date from the date-range of the Medication was ordered.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.
